posts.post_content:
I have the opportunity to pick up a much wanted T210 so these cards now available.Price includes shipping.The Wiseman has a clean reverse,the grade being due to a small bit of paper loss next to his glove.Please message me if you have any interest/questions.I will also consider trades for T209/T210 cards.Thank you.

Lynch 
Wiseman
Back scan available upon request.Thank you
